text:
micronutrient intakes for pregnant and lactating women
MICRONUTRIENT WHO MEMBER STATES* 
Vitamin A µg 800.0 600.0–1500.0
Thiamine (vitamin B1) mg 1.4 1.0–1.7
Riboflavin (vitamin B2) mg 1.4 1.4–2.0
Niacin (vitamin B3) mg 18.0 16.0–20.0
Vitamin B6 mg 1.9 1.4–2.3
Vitamin B12 µg 2.6 2.0–4.0
Vitamin C mg 55.0 50.0–110.0
Vitamin D µg 5.0 5.0–25.0
Vitamin E mg 15.0 10.0
Folic acid µg 600.0 300.0–600.0
Iron mg 27.0 9.0–50.0
Zinc mg 10.0 7.3–25.0
Copper mg 1.15 1.0–1.3
Selenium µg 30.0 60.0–70.0
Iodine
